EXPERIENCE_OVERVIEW_COPY: Dive into brilliant Colour, blazing graphics, faster performance, and intuitive controls that fuel your creativity and free your ideas to flow.
EXPERIENCE_CRAFTSMANSHIP_COPY: A minimal footprint and exceptionally thin profile meet the demands of the creative process, whether using Surface Studio 2 upright like a PC or drawing on it like a drafting table.
EXPERIENCE_CRAFTSMANSHIP_POPLEFT_COPY: Adjust the display weightlessly down to 20 degrees with one hand for comfortable drawing and creating.
EXPERIENCE_CRAFTSMANSHIP_POPRIGHT_COPY:
•	USB-C port for video out and charging
•	4 USB 3.0 ports
•	Full-size SD™ card reader (SDXC compatible)
•	3.5 mm headset jack
•	1 Gigabit Ethernet port
EXPERIENCE_DISPLAY_COPY: The 28” PixelSense™ Display touchscreen with 13.5 million pixels of true-to-life Colour perfectly captures your creativity, whether illustrating a book or designing a virtual world.
EXPERIENCE_DISPLAY_POPLEFT_COPY: Create using Adobe® CC and other apps with custom interfaces designed exclusively for Surface touchscreen.
EXPERIENCE_DISPLAY_POPBOTTOM_COPY: Create in new ways with Surface Dial* seamlessly integrated into apps from Adobe®, Corel, Concepts, and more.
EXPERIENCE_DISPLAY_POPTOP_COPY: A faster, more powerful processor, blazing graphics, and lightning-fast SSD fuel the intensive software* your creativity demands.
ACCESSORIES_LEFT_COPY: Add innovative, intuitive tools designed to unleash a seamless flow of ideas.
ACCESSORIES_LEFT_POPLEFT_COPY: Stay connected with amazing audio, exceptional call clarity, and built-in intelligence on the go and in the office.
ACCESSORIES_LEFT_POPRIGHT_COPY: A completely new way to interact with technology and create in the most natural, immersive way.
ACCESSORIES_RIGHT_COPY: Designed for comfort and precision, Surface Studio 2 includes the tools you use most for bringing creativity and productivity together.
ACCESSORIES_RIGHT_POPLEFT_COPY: Pairs seamlessly with your Surface using Wireless Bluetooth at a range of up to 50 feet and with battery power to last a full year.
ACCESSORIES_RIGHT_POPTOP_COPY: Natural writing and drawing tool, perfect for creating in new ways.
ACCESSORIES_RIGHT_POPRIGHT_COPY: Sleek, ergonomic design meets exceptional precision and performance.
ACCESSORIES_GATEWAY_HEADLINE: Try adjusting the screen to draw more comfortably
ACCESSORIES_INTERACTIVE_COPY: With Surface Dial* in one hand and Surface Pen in the other, you can unlock your creativity with easy access to shortcuts, controls, drawing tools, and more.
ACCESSORIES_INTERACTIVE_BULLET_TITLE: Surface Pen is fast and responsive
ACCESSORIES_INTERACTIVE_BULLET_ONE: Naturally write and draw with tilt functionality and rubber eraser.
ACCESSORIES_INTERACTIVE_BULLET_TWO: 4,096 pressure points to sketch, shade, and paint with artistic precision.
ACCESSORIES_INTERACTIVE_BULLET_THREE: Rest your palm on the screen as you create.
ACCESSORIES_INTERACTIVE_BULLET_FOUR: Jot down a note, create an amazing artwork, and more.
ACCESSORIES_INTERACTIVE_PEN_TRYIT_COPY: Pick up the pen and start Colouring
ACCESSORIES_INTERACTIVE_DIAL_TRYIT_COPY: Place Surface Dial anywhere on screen
BEST_BULLET_ONE_COPY: Full Windows 10 features and capabilities on an ultra-convenient device.
BEST_BULLET_TWO_COPY: Use Cortana* to set reminders on your PC and get it later on your phone. Access your photos, notes, and Office docs on all your devices (Android, iOS, etc.).
BEST_BULLET_TWO_LEGAL: *Cortana available in select markets. Experience may vary by region and device.
BEST_BULLET_THREE_COPY: Sign in to your device and apps with a smile or a touch.
BEST_BULLET_FOUR_COPY: Work anywhere, online or offline. Office 365 sold separately.
COMPARE_COPY: Compare features and specs to see how each Surface device stacks up.
COMPARE_DEVICE_ONE_POP_COPY: Work and play virtually anywhere with laptop-to-tablet versatility and all-day battery life*
COMPARE_DEVICE_ONE_POP_BULLET_ONE_COPY: 8th Generation Intel® Core™ processor for faster, smoother multitasking.
COMPARE_DEVICE_ONE_POP_BULLET_TWO_COPY: Ultra-portable design, starting at just 1.7 lbs and only 0.33” thin.
COMPARE_DEVICE_ONE_POP_BULLET_THREE_COPY: Up to 13.5 hours of video playback* and the power to do what you want on the go.
COMPARE_DEVICE_ONE_POP_BULLET_THREE_LEGA: *Battery life varies significantly with settings, usage, and other factors.
COMPARE_DEVICE_ONE_POP_BULLET_FOUR_COPY: Vibrant Colour and resolution. Perfect for Surface Pen*** and touch.
COMPARE_DEVICE_ONE_POP_BULLET_FIVE_COPY: Fanless cooling system**** lets you work, play, and stream in peace.
COMPARE_DEVICE_ONE_POP_BULLET_FIVE_LEGAL: ****Fanless cooling system included with Surface Pro 6 i5 models only.
COMPARE_DEVICE_TWO_POP_COPY: Nearly 4x more power and up to 17 hours* of battery life, with blazing graphics in a 15” or 13.5” PixelSense™ Display.
COMPARE_DEVICE_TWO_POP_COPY_LEGAL: *Battery life varies significantly with settings, usage, and other factors.
COMPARE_DEVICE_TWO_POP_BULLET_ONE_TITLE: Designed with innovation in every detail
COMPARE_DEVICE_TWO_POP_BULLET_ONE_COPY: Lightweight and powerful with unprecedented performance in a laptop this size.
COMPARE_DEVICE_TWO_POP_BULLET_TWO_COPY: Up to 17 hours of battery life* and 70% more than MacBook Pro 13”.*
COMPARE_DEVICE_TWO_POP_BULLET_TWO_LEGAL: *Battery life varies significantly with settings, usage, and other factors.
COMPARE_DEVICE_TWO_POP_BULLET_THREE_COPY: Stunning Colour and graphics in 15” or 13.5” touchscreen displays.
COMPARE_DEVICE_TWO_POP_BULLET_FOUR_COPY: Switch seamlessly between Laptop, Tablet, Studio, and View Modes.
COMPARE_DEVICE_TWO_POP_BULLET_FIVE_COPY: Connect, charge, transfer, and display via USB-C, USB 3.1, full-size SD card, and Surface Dock.**
COMPARE_DEVICE_THREE_POP_COPY: Take your ideas from concept to reality with blazing graphics, innovative features, and a 28” PixelSense™ Display.
COMPARE_DEVICE_THREE_POP_BULLET_ONE_TITL: Designed for the way you work
COMPARE_DEVICE_THREE_POP_BULLET_ONE_COPY: Use Surface Studio 2 upright, or draw on it like a drafting table.
COMPARE_DEVICE_THREE_POP_BULLET_TWO_COPY: Unlock your creativity with Surface Pen*, Surface Dial*, and touch.
COMPARE_DEVICE_THREE_POP_BULLET_THREE_CO: Run all your favorite software, like Adobe® CC,* Office 365,* and more.
COMPARE_DEVICE_THREE_POP_BULLET_FOUR_COP: 13.5 million pixels of pure, true-to-life Colours and clarity.
COMPARE_DEVICE_THREE_POP_BULLET_FIVE_COP: 4x USB 3.0, USB-C, full-size SD™ card reader (SDXC compatible), 3.5mm headset jack, and 1 Gb Ethernet port.
COMPARE_DEVICE_FOUR_POP_COPY: Go beyond the traditional laptop with the perfect balance of power and sleek design.
COMPARE_DEVICE_FOUR_POP_BULLET_ONE_COPY: Clean, elegant details and rich, tone-on-tone Colour combinations.**
COMPARE_DEVICE_FOUR_POP_BULLET_ONE_LEGAL: **Colours available on selected models only; available Colours may vary by store.
COMPARE_DEVICE_FOUR_POP_BULLET_TWO_COPY: Fast processors and up to 14.5 hours of battery life* in a 0.57” thin design.
COMPARE_DEVICE_FOUR_POP_BULLET_TWO_LEGAL: *Battery life varies significantly with settings, usage, and other factors.
COMPARE_DEVICE_FOUR_POP_BULLET_THREE_COP: Aluminum shell and durable Alcantara® keyboard–all at just 2.76 pounds.
COMPARE_DEVICE_FOUR_POP_BULLET_FOUR_COPY: Razor-sharp resolution on an interactive screen made for touch.
COMPARE_DEVICE_FOUR_POP_BULLET_FIVE_COPY: Omnisonic Speakers deliver crisp, clear audio for music, shows, and more.
COMPARE_DEVICE_FIVE_POP_COPY: Laptop performance meets tablet portability to deliver the flexibility you need.
COMPARE_DEVICE_FIVE_POP_BULLET_ONE_COPY: Only 0.33” thin and starting at just 1.15 lbs. to fit easily in your bag.
COMPARE_DEVICE_FIVE_POP_BULLET_TWO_TITLE: Fast, efficient, with performance that lasts
COMPARE_DEVICE_FIVE_POP_BULLET_TWO_COPY: Run day-to-day software and apps, plus full Windows 10 features.

COMPARE_DEVICE_FIVE_POP_BULLET_THREE_LEG: *Battery life varies significantly with settings, usage, and other factors.

COMPARE_DEVICE_FIVE_POP_BULLET_FIVE_COPY: Instantly adapt and adjust to home, travel, and everyday tasks.
